options.content:
- **Use Cases**: This dashboard shows code coverage metrics from Codecov organized by flags (test types).
- **Data Source Required**: Codecov
- **Metrics**: Overall Coverage (per flag), Lines Coverage (per flag), and Patch Coverage (repository-wide)
- **Patch Coverage**: Shows how well changed code is tested. Calculated by Codecov from actual git diffs. Note: Patch coverage is the same for all flags as it measures repository-wide coverage of changed code.

panels.description: Total code coverage percentage for the selected test type (flag). Represents: (lines covered / total lines) Ã— 100%

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(t.coverage_percentage, 2) as value
FROM _tool_codecov_coverage_trends t
INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON t.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos'
WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}'
  AND t.repo_id = '${repo_id}'
  AND t.flag_name = '${flag_name}'
ORDER BY t.date DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Overall Coverage

panels.description: Total number of lines of code tracked by the selected test type (flag)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT c.lines_total FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}' AND c.lines_total > 0 ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1),
    0
  ) as value

panels.title: Total Lines

panels.description: Number of lines covered by the selected test type (flag)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT c.lines_covered FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}' AND c.lines_covered > 0 ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1),
    0
  ) as value

panels.title: Lines Covered

panels.description: Number of lines NOT covered by the selected test type (flag). Calculated as: Total Lines - Lines Covered

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT (c.lines_total - c.lines_covered) FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}' AND c.lines_total > 0 ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1),
    0
  ) as value

panels.title: Uncovered Lines

panels.description: Historical trend of overall coverage percentage for the selected test type (flag). Shows how total code coverage changes over time.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  dates.time_sec,
  ROUND(COALESCE(
    d.coverage_percentage,
    (SELECT t2.coverage_percentage FROM _tool_codecov_coverage_trends t2
     WHERE t2.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND t2.flag_name = '${flag_name}'
       AND t2.date <= dates.date_val
     ORDER BY t2.date DESC LIMIT 1)
  ), 2) as value
FROM (
  SELECT
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(DATE($__timeFrom()), INTERVAL n DAY)) as time_sec,
    DATE_ADD(DATE($__timeFrom()), INTERVAL n DAY) as date_val
  FROM (
    SELECT a.N + b.N * 10 + c.N * 100 as n
    FROM (SELECT 0 AS N UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) a,
         (SELECT 0 AS N UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) b,
         (SELECT 0 AS N UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3) c
  ) nums
  WHERE DATE_ADD(DATE($__timeFrom()), INTERVAL n DAY) <= DATE($__timeTo())
) dates
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT t.date as date_val, t.coverage_percentage
  FROM _tool_codecov_coverage_trends t
  INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON t.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos'
  WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}'
    AND t.repo_id = '${repo_id}'
    AND t.flag_name = '${flag_name}'
) d ON dates.date_val = d.date_val
ORDER BY dates.time_sec

panels.title: Overall Coverage Trend

panels.description: Repository-wide patch coverage from Codecov. Shows how well changed code is tested across all test types. This is calculated by Codecov from actual git diffs. Note: Same value for all flags since Codecov calculates patch coverage at repository level.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT AVG(patch_per_commit) FROM (
       SELECT comp.commit_sha, MAX(comp.patch) as patch_per_commit
       FROM _tool_codecov_comparisons comp
       INNER JOIN _tool_codecov_commits cm ON comp.connection_id = cm.connection_id AND comp.repo_id = cm.repo_id AND comp.commit_sha = cm.commit_sha
       WHERE comp.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND comp.patch IS NOT NULL
         AND cm.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND cm.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo()
       GROUP BY comp.commit_sha
     ) sub),
    0
  ), 2) as value

panels.title: Patch Coverage

panels.description: Historical trend of lines covered vs total lines for the selected test type (flag). Blue line shows total lines tracked, green line shows lines covered.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  dates.time_sec,
  ROUND(@last_covered := COALESCE(d.avg_covered, @last_covered), 0) as 'Lines Covered',
  ROUND(@last_total := COALESCE(d.avg_total, @last_total), 0) as 'Lines Total'
FROM (
  SELECT
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(DATE($__timeFrom()), INTERVAL n DAY)) as time_sec,
    DATE_ADD(DATE($__timeFrom()), INTERVAL n DAY) as date_val
  FROM (
    SELECT a.N + b.N * 10 + c.N * 100 as n
    FROM (SELECT 0 AS N UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) a,
         (SELECT 0 AS N UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) b,
         (SELECT 0 AS N UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3) c
  ) nums
  WHERE DATE_ADD(DATE($__timeFrom()), INTERVAL n DAY) <= DATE($__timeTo())
) dates
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    DATE(c.commit_timestamp) as date_val,
    AVG(c.lines_covered) as avg_covered,
    AVG(c.lines_total) as avg_total
  FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c
  INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos'
  WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}'
    AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}'
    AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}'
    AND c.lines_total > 0
    AND c.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
    AND c.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo()
  GROUP BY DATE(c.commit_timestamp)
) d ON dates.date_val = d.date_val
CROSS JOIN (SELECT @last_covered := NULL, @last_total := NULL) init
ORDER BY dates.time_sec

panels.title: Lines Coverage Trend

panels.description: Daily repository-wide patch coverage from Codecov. Shows how well changed code is tested each day. Calculated by Codecov from actual git diffs. Note: Same value for all flags. Days without changes carry forward the last value.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  dates.time_sec,
  ROUND(@last_val := COALESCE(d.daily_patch, @last_val, 0), 2) as value
FROM (
  SELECT
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(DATE($__timeFrom()), INTERVAL n DAY)) as time_sec,
    DATE_ADD(DATE($__timeFrom()), INTERVAL n DAY) as date_val
  FROM (
    SELECT a.N + b.N * 10 + c.N * 100 as n
    FROM (SELECT 0 AS N UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) a,
         (SELECT 0 AS N UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) b,
         (SELECT 0 AS N UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3) c
  ) nums
  WHERE DATE_ADD(DATE($__timeFrom()), INTERVAL n DAY) <= DATE($__timeTo())
) dates
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    DATE(commit_ts) as date_val,
    AVG(patch_per_commit) as daily_patch
  FROM (
    SELECT comp.commit_sha, cm.commit_timestamp as commit_ts, MAX(comp.patch) as patch_per_commit
    FROM _tool_codecov_comparisons comp
    INNER JOIN _tool_codecov_commits cm ON comp.connection_id = cm.connection_id AND comp.repo_id = cm.repo_id AND comp.commit_sha = cm.commit_sha
    WHERE comp.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND comp.patch IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY comp.commit_sha, cm.commit_timestamp
  ) sub
  GROUP BY DATE(commit_ts)
) d ON dates.date_val = d.date_val
CROSS JOIN (SELECT @last_val := 0) init
ORDER BY dates.time_sec

panels.title: Patch Coverage Trend

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT name FROM projects ORDER BY name LIMIT 1
list.label: Project
list.name: project
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT name FROM projects ORDER BY name

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT c.repo_id FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' ORDER BY c.repo_id LIMIT 1
list.label: Repository
list.name: repo_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT c.repo_id FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' ORDER BY c.repo_id

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT c.flag_name FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name != '' AND c.flag_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.flag_name LIMIT 1
list.label: Test Name
list.name: flag_name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT c.flag_name FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name != '' AND c.flag_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.flag_name
